title: Complete Blood Count (CBC) with Blood Film
description: A comprehensive blood test to assess overall health and detect a variety of disorders, including anemia, infection, and many other diseases.

title: Diabetes Screening
description: A series of tests to diagnose and monitor diabetes and its complications.

title: Liver Function Test (LFT)
description: A group of blood tests that assess the liver's ability to function properly and its overall health.

title: Kidney Function Test
description: A panel of tests to evaluate kidney function and detect any potential kidney disorders.

title: Thyroid Function Test
description: Tests to evaluate thyroid gland performance and diagnose thyroid-related conditions.

title: Lipid Profile
description: A group of tests to measure the amount of cholesterol and triglycerides in your blood, assessing cardiovascular risk.

title: Cardiac Risk Assessment
description: Tests designed to assess your risk of developing cardiovascular diseases.

title: Comprehensive Health Checkup
description: A full-body examination that includes various tests to assess overall health and detect potential health issues early.
